data.title: B Site Execute Wall / Slow Orb
data.description: Use this setup to aggressively take and deny space in and around B Site.

data.title: Aggressive Early Round A Main Slow Orb
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective aggressive early round A Main Slow Orb, that makes it more difficult for the Defenders to take space in A Main.
